syllabus_leaves.path: FUNDAMENTAL RIGHTS > 2. Right to Freedom-Articles 19 to 22 > Limitations > (b) Protection in Respect of Conviction for Offences: > (ii) No one can be punished or prosecuted for the same offence twice.

syllabus_leaves.path: FUNDAMENTAL RIGHTS > 2. Right to Freedom-Articles 19 to 22 > Limitations > (b) Protection in Respect of Conviction for Offences: > (iii) A person cannot be compelled to be a witness in the case where he himself is accused of the offence.
